Articles.Content:
Sector 7 Space Laboratories - Space Exploration Division - Alpha Delta 21


Alpha Delta 21 was built in the 90 version and was revealed but not shared because of the amount of stages that were making it very difficult to Orbit. I designed a better launcher recently in this new version 1.0.5., which brought the part count from 1,200 to 607. I have pictures showing both launchers. I was able to achieve Mun Orbit then refuel and had a near Duna Orbit with a tug but fell short. Soon I plan to make another mission to Duna. Also if you enjoy jet packing around you will loving flying around inside the structure of this station.

Recent Post about Alpha Delta 21

Photo Album


Engineer's Report
Parts: 607
Mass: 1,299.1t
Height: 52.5
Width: 36.8
Length: 36.8

Craft Assembly

6-Docking Ports
10-Labs
8-Junior Labs
2-MK1 Lander Cans
4-Jumbo-64 Fuel Storage Tanks
1-Hitchhiker Container

Flight Operations:
Engage SAS and throttle up to full then press space-bar, If you can do what I call the Manley Roll at 15,000m rolling to a 45 degree then you are halfway to Orbit with the Station with only one stage to perform, the rest is your pilot skills.

Flight Controls
1- Communications
2- Station Lights
